column1: 6.2	  Anatomical factors  Tumour size, venous invasion and extension, collecting system invasion, perinephric- and sinus fat invasion,   adrenal involvement, and LN and distant metastasis are included in the TNM classification system [178, 179]   (Table 4.1).
Use the current Tumour, Node, Metastasis classification system.
Use the WHO/ISUP grading system and classify renal cell carcinoma type.
Use prognostic models in localised and metastatic disease.
Do not routinely use molecular markers to assess prognosis.
